annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Indicates whether the physical carrier is found (e.g. whether a cable is plugged in or not).

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Array of object paths representing devices which are currently slaved to this device.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: A dictionary mapping property names to variant boxed values
